channel.title: FriendSnap Inovated media sharing network
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2v8l6hc.png[/img]
Hey guys today i would love if you guys can help out with this site it be nice it still have bugs but i want opinions on the design and overall UE for the website!
http://www.friendsnap.me/

item.title: FriendSnap Inovated media sharing network
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

I can agree with everyone on the navigation bars. However, OP. Why are you asking for feedback? You didn’t even make this website.

Read full topic

item.title: FriendSnap Inovated media sharing network
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:4, topic:544663”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=663537.msg4434492#msg4434492 date=1404586527]
Innovative my ass. It looks like a heavily modified version of instagram.
[/quote]l2marketing

You should go flame everything Apple has put together in the past 10 years as well LoL[/quote]
You know what, I will!
I’m just saying.
And I have to agree with you on the whole 2 navigation bars. Especially where the side menu one covers the one going over the top. I just have a thing about visibility and I get nitpicky over stupid shit.

Read full topic
